channel.title: Sports
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Sports, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 2025 College Football Playoff, Bowl Buzz: Michigan State Hires New QB Coach
item.description: Here's the latest on what's happening around college football during the postseason.

item.title: MLB Free Agency Rumors, Buzz: New Team Enters Alex Bregman Sweepstakes
item.description: Keeping track of players who may be on the move, manager comings and goings, and other buzz from around the majors.

item.title: 2025 NFL, CFB Odds: Best Bets for Seahawks-Panthers, Indiana-Alabama
item.description: Sammy P has his eyes on one CFP contest, a few bowl games and a pair of NFL Week 17 showdowns. See how he's wagering.

item.title: Chargers vs. Texans Live Updates, Score: LA, Houston Vie for Playoff Position
item.description: Follow along for the highlights and top plays as the Chargers and Texans fight for the title in their respective divisions!

item.title: 2025 NFL Week 17 Buzz: Could 49ers Star LB Fred Warner Return In Playoffs?
item.description: Who's hurt? Who's practicing? Who's starting? Who's on the hot seat? Here's the latest on what's happening around the league entering Week 17.

item.title: Matthew Stafford vs. Drake Maye: Inside the odds, betting for the NFL's MVP race
item.description: Doug Greenberg goes inside the betting lines about the NFL MVP award, and Pamela Maldonado offers her best bet.

item.title: Burrow gifts O-linemen authentic dinosaur, bear and mammoth fossils for Christmas
item.description: Burrow's love of fossils gained national acclaim because of a clip from the Netflix series "Quarterback."

item.title: One stat that will make or break 2026 for all 15 NL teams
item.description: Here are the numbers that could define your favorite National League squad in the new year.

item.title: Ranking the biggest MLB Christmas week moves
item.description: Who says the offseason slows down for the holidays? Let's remember some free agent signings and trades.

item.title: Most fashionable arrivals of NFL Week 17, featuring Derwin James
item.description: Before the NFL's Week 17 slate kicked off, players made sure to put their most fashionable foot forward.
